comment: So tour this year . You guys are good at keeping a secret . But maybe could you possibly work on giving us a little more notice ? I know we should be used to it by now . And convince to do a show with ME !
amr:
# ::snt So tour this year . You guys are good at keeping a secret . But maybe could you possibly work on giving us a little more notice ? I know we should be used to it by now . And convince to do a show with ME !
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (t / tour-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :time (y2 / year
                  :mod (t2 / this)))
      :snt2 (g / good-03
            :ARG1 (g2 / guy
                  :mod (y3 / you))
            :ARG2 (k / keep-01
                  :ARG0 g2
                  :ARG1 (s / secret)))
      :snt3 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG2 (p / possible-01
                  :ARG1 (w / work-01
                        :ARG0 y3
                        :ARG1 (g3 / give-01
                              :ARG0 y3
                              :ARG1 (n / notice-03
                                    :ARG1-of (h / have-quant-91
                                          :ARG3 (m2 / more
                                                :quant (l / little))))
                              :ARG2 (w2 / we)))
                  :ARG1-of (p2 / possible-01)))
      :snt4 (k2 / know-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (r / recommend-01
                  :ARG1 (u / use-02
                        :ARG0 w2
                        :ARG1 (ii2 / it)
                        :time (b / by
                              :op1 (n2 / now)))))
      :snt5 (a / and
            :op2 (c2 / convince-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 y3
                  :ARG2 (s2 / show-04
                        :ARG0 y3
                        :ARG2 ii))))

comment: I'm not going . No one other than you will notice .
amr:

      :snt2 (n / notice-01
            :ARG0 (n2 / no-one
                  :ARG2-of (e / except-01

comment: Ok , maybe two of you will notice . But I'm still not going .
